Profile: With two decades of experience in front-end development, critical thinking, and problem-solving, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table. My proficiency spans many UI frameworks, libraries, and languages, including React, HTML, JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, and Sass. I have a proven track record of creating mobile-friendly websites with and without Bootstrap, Material, or Tailwind. My experience and ability to work with large and small teams, my desire for quality, and my ability to think creatively when standard methods fail have been instrumental in my success in developing large-scale consumer websites. I thrive in high-pressure environments, handling multiple responsibilities with ease, and I am adept at interacting with individuals at all levels. As a passionate learner, I constantly seek to broaden my knowledge and grow as a developer.

Technologies.Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Less, JSON, XML
Technologies.Tools / Libraries: React, Redux, Next, AngularJS, Material, Bootstrap, Tailwind, jQuery, ESLint, Node, NPM, Express, Webpack, Jest, GIT, GitLab, GraphQL, Bitbucket, Jasmine, Jenkins, Agile, Scrum, Kanban Methodologies
Technologies.Software: WebStorm, Visual Studio Code, Eclipse, IntelliJ, Fiddler, Postman, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe XD, Confluence, JIRA, Figma

IndustryExperience: Energy, Restaurant, Communication, Commodity Trading, Sports, Healthcare, Pharmacy Tech, Insurance, Integrated Digital Technologies, Marketing, Financial, Education, Automotive, Railroad, and Beverage
Competencies: My competencies encompass a broad spectrum of UI Design and Development, UI Architecture, Project Design and Development, Framework Development, Object-Oriented Programming, User Experience (UX), and Usability. This comprehensive skill set enables me to deliver high-quality solutions across various projects.
